String.Source: Burning Inferno Comes To Help Blade!
String.Dest: 灼熱の業火がブレードを助けにきた！

String.Source: Burning Inferno Comes To Help Bane!
String.Dest: 灼熱の業火がベインを助けにきた！

String.Source: Burning Inferno the Crime Punisher is After Me!
String.Dest: 断罪の灼熱の業火が後ろにいる！

String.Source: Burning Inferno Appears! Justice has found me at last...
String.Dest: 灼熱の業火があらわれた！ついに裁かれるときがきたのだ…
灼熱の業火が復讐にあらわれた！

String.Source: Mama Dragon Appears! She heard her baby's screams...
String.Dest: ママ・ドラゴンがあらわれた！子ども達の叫びを聞きつけたんだ…

String.Source: Mephala Master Death Knight Has Tracked You Down...
String.Dest: メファーラのマスター・デスナイトが追跡してきた…
